title: Couldn't get back to a game where I got disconnected
body:
Okay, so I've never intentionally left a game before and when I've gotten disconnected, I've always been able to get right back in. 

But just now when I was "reconnecting" to the game, I had to close it briefly to make sure my internet was fine. I was facing no internet connection whatsoever. So I started up League again, and for the first time, the client made no effort to let me get back into the game that I was disconnected from. And of course it was during the first game in a while where I had a competent ADC.

At the time of writing this, the game seemed to have been suffering from "server side player preference", and I'm really not sure if that has an effect on the issue at all. I've always been a good noodle and I just don't want to worry about someone reporting me for leaving the game, even though the game itself won't let me back in it, even though I can apparently start up a new game.


Was there something stupid I did, or is there just something I can do to prevent this from happening again?

replies.body: Generally speaking if the client doesn't let you reconnect it means one of two things: the game ended, or everyone disconnected at the same time and the server cancelled the game. If this is rare, you have nothing to worry about :)
I suppose it was the latter, because the weirdest thing about it is that my match history didn't even document the game.
is it similar to this issue? [link to issue I just had](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/4NfWgFod-500-ping-and-disconnect-issues)
Well, I played another game after and was fine during it all, so it could've been a one time thing. I'll take a look at that guide anyway though. Thanks.

It's not too uncommon for someone's network to be able to connect to sites like google normally but unable to reach certain game servers, which sounds like what might have been happening here. Not entirely sure what you mean by "server side player preference", but essentially, your network just couldn't get reconnected to our servers.

Double check a couple network settings using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource, specifically Port Forwarding and DNS settings.
